author: Melody
text: I attempted to buy 2 pairs of shoes first was refunded the next day. The 2nd was shipped to stock x but I was eventually refunded and told there was a processing issue. Disappointing these were supposed to be my boyfriends birthday gift.
title: I attempted to buy 2 pairs of shoes…

author: Jenni
text: I ordered a pair of shoes for my son's birthday. It said that the purchase went through but it showed that it was missing part of our address. When I pushed the "review your order" it showed that our ordered had not been completed, so I pushed the complete order button again. This caused another order to be placed, and your website does not allow returns and has no way to contact. Your website is very misleading and now I'm stuck with 2 pairs of the same shoes. Very displeased with your business and will not be ordering from you again.
title: I ordered a pair of shoes for my son's…

title: Very slow shipping.

I had ordered these to arrive before my birthday and before I left out of town, and still waiting for you guys to get the shoes to look at.  So far, I’m disappointed.

title: I still don't have my shoes that I…

I just received my new shoes. I never had issues with your company, but this time i do.

My shoes have some imperctions and marks on it which isn’t normal on a new pair.
title: I would rather have a refound

author: Brian Larsen
text: Hard to rate.  Still don’t have my product.  Depends on how long it takes.
title: Hard to rate

author: David
text: Terrible customer support and near impossible to get ahold of anyone. Everything is done through a chat and getting a responsive back takes a while. They must be understaffed because when I asked about a phone number to call they said they were still developing that process. Seems baffling to not have that line of support when phones have been around much longer than a chat service. There are numerous forums and reviews of packages being stolen and StockX not taking the action seriously or ever returning the purchase price. My package was stolen and after getting the runaround I contacted PayPal for my cash return. Got it resolved quickly. Cannot use StockX again because account has been terminated. I could care less because I got my money back promptly. I would advise reading the terms of service before purchasing because StockX holds all the power and they can simply decide not to do anything and the loss is on the consumer. Just a bad business.
title: Terrible customer support and near…
